______________________________ Reply Separator _________________________________
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Missed Notes
Author: Non-HP-orang (orang@...) at HP-ColSprings,mimegw5
Date: 8/11/99 12:18 PM


From: "Sean Kennedy" <orang@...>


----- Original Message -----
From: Abraham Hardjana <ahardjan@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, August 11, 1999 8:47 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Missed Notes


> From: Abraham Hardjana <ahardjan@...>
>
> I was wondering if this is a server specific issue also. I am a lv 23
> bard and last night while kiting a Stone Guardian in Nectulos Forest I was
> experiencing quite a bit of lost notes while singing the standard bellow
> bellow accelerando combo. In the end I had about 10-12 missed notes on
> the bellow and about 5 on the accelerando. So here is my info to find out
> if it may be server, or even server group related. I myself have been
> getting bad server lag spikes.
>
> Lvl 23
> Karana Server
> Wood Elf Bard
> DEX 102
> CHA 96
>

For the data set, I've noticed neither more missed notes nor more
spell fizzles (my shaman) in the past week

16th level bard
Half Elf
Povar
Dex 101
Agi 95

9th Shaman
Barbarian
Povar
Dex 74 (84 with buff)
Agi 90 (105 with feet like cat)
